definition: a series of small (usually idle) twists or turns, manipulate, as in a nervous or unconscious manner
details:
noun
- a series of small (usually idle) twists or turns
verb
- manipulate, as in a nervous or unconscious manner
= example: manipulate, as in a nervous or unconscious manner
= synonyms: fiddle with
- turn in a twisting or spinning motion
= synonyms: twirl, whirl, swirl
